summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, to establish a landmark theater preservation bonus in the DOC 1, DOC 2, and DRC zones, and amend height and development standards in the DMC zone; amending the Official Zoning Map and Sections 23.49.008, 23.49.050, 23.49.070, 23.49.100, and 23.49.136 of the Seattle Municipal Code.
